mapper.insert: insert into user_service_infos (user_service_info_id, user_id, job_category, user_postion, provence_code, city_code, district_code, address_detail, photo_url, create_time, update_time, is_delete, user_service_name) values (#{userServiceInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{jobCategory,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userPostion,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{provenceCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{districtCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{userServiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update user_service_infos
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
job_category = #{jobCategory,jdbcType=BIGINT},
user_postion = #{userPostion,jdbcType=BIGINT},
provence_code = #{provenceCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
district_code = #{districtCode,jdbcType=BIGINT},
address_detail = #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
photo_url = #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT},
user_service_name = #{userServiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where user_service_info_id = #{userServiceInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_service_infos set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, job_category = #{jobCategory,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_postion = #{userPostion,jdbcType=BIGINT}, provence_code = #{provenceCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, city_code = #{cityCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, district_code = #{districtCode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, address_detail = #{addressDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_url = #{photoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, user_service_name = #{userServiceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where user_service_info_id = #{userServiceInfoId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select us.user_id as userId, us.job_category as jobCategory, us.user_postion as userPosition, us.city_code as cityCode, us.district_code as districtCode, us.address_detail as addressDetail, us.photo_url as photoUrl, us.create_time as createTime, us.update_time as updateTime, us.user_service_name as userName, count(sa.senior_id) as nums from user_service_infos us left join senior_account sa on us.user_id=sa.create_user_id where us.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select us.user_id as userId, us.job_category as jobCategory, us.user_postion as userPosition, us.city_code as cityCode, us.district_code as districtCode, us.address_detail as addressDetail, us.photo_url as photoUrl, us.create_time as createTime, us.update_time as updateTime, us.user_service_name as userName from user_service_infos us where us.job_category=0
select us.user_id as userId, '无' as 'desc', us.photo_url as photoUrl, us.user_service_name as userServiceName from user_service_infos us where user_id=#{userId} where us.job_category=0
